Welcome to q2_extractor¶

  • Index
  • Search Page

Extractor¶

Contains q2Extractor, a “plain” extractor class, mostly returning Pandas DataFrames from QIIME2 artifacts

class q2_extractor.Extractor.q2Extractor(artifact_path)¶

This class attempts to extract the useful information from a QIIME2 artifact file.

MetaHCRExtractor¶

An extractor class intended to shuttle QIIME2 results into the MetaHCR project (https://github.com/metahcr/metahcr_v1).
